scripts.build-preview: npm run build && npm run preview
scripts.git-ignore-playground: git update-index --assume-unchanged src/components/Playground/Playground.ts && git update-index --assume-unchanged src/components/Playground/Playground.html && git update-index --assume-unchanged src/components/Playground/Playground.css
scripts.git-unignore-playground: git update-index --no-assume-unchanged src/components/Playground/Playground.ts && git update-index --no-assume-unchanged src/components/Playground/Playground.html && git update-index --no-assume-unchanged src/components/Playground/Playground.css
